hero.description:
Avion is a simple but effective to-do list app aimed at
modern design and ease of use.

first.title: Turn Ideas into Reality with a Single Touch
first.description:
Never miss important moments! With Avion, you can effortlessly
 add tasks and to-dos in an instant. 
Whether it's a note, a deadline, or crucial milestones, we'll help you input
everything into your task list.

second.title: Your World, Your Order
second.description:
Organize your tasks as you prefer. 
Avion enables you to create categories. 
Sort tasks by date, priority, or category to always stay in the loop about what matters today.

third.title: Design Reflects Your Style
third.description: Your workspace, your style. Avion offers you a range of themes to choose from, ensuring your eyes always delight in the convenience and beauty of the interface.

fourth.title: Details: The Key to Success
fourth.description: Details matter! Evaluate tasks by priority, attach notes and files to ensure nothing escapes your attention. Avion allows you to focus on the finer points, enabling you to achieve great results.

footer.description: Create your list of dreams and start realizing them today!

login.title: Log in
login.description: Sign in if you already have an account.

signup.title: Sign up
signup.description: Create an account and start using avion.

reset.title: Request new password
reset.description: To reset your password, please enter the email address of your avion account.

quotes:
You don't have to be great to start, 
but you have to start to be great.

The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule,
 but to schedule your priorities.

Productivity is being able to do things
 that you were not able to do before.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.

Success is not final, failure is not fatal:
 It is the courage to continue that counts.

Don't watch the clock, do what it does.
 Keep going.
The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.

Happiness is not something ready made.
 It comes from your own actions.
The biggest risk is not taking any risk...
Do something wonderful, people may imitate it.
It always seems impossible until it's done.
You are one decision away from a totally different life.

The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling,
 but in rising every time we fall.

The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago.
 The second best time is now.
